Package com.intellij.openapi.fileEditor

Class FileDocumentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.openapi.fileEditor.FileDocumentManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SavingRequestor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileDocumentManagerImpl, MockFileDocumentManagerImpl

    public abstract class FileDocumentManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements SavingRequestor
    Tracks the correspondence between VirtualFile instances and corresponding Document instances. Manages the saving of changes to disk.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FileDocumentManager.WriteAccessStatus
      Stores the write access status (true if the document has the write access; false otherwise) and a message about the reason for the read-only status.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static FileDocumentManager getInstance()

      • getDocument

        public abstract Document getDocument(VirtualFile file)
        Returns the document for the specified virtual file.

        Documents are cached on weak or strong references, depending on the nature of the virtual file. If the document for the given virtual file is not yet cached, the file's contents are read from VFS and loaded into heap memory. An appropriate encoding is used. All line separators are converted to \n.

        Should be invoked in a read action.

        Parameters:
        file - the file for which the document is requested.
        Returns:
        the document, or null if the file represents a directory, or is binary without an associated decompiler, or is too large.
        See Also:
        VirtualFile.contentsToByteArray(), Application.runReadAction(Computable)

      • getCachedDocument

        public abstract Document getCachedDocument(VirtualFile file)
        Returns the document for the specified file which has already been loaded into memory.

        Client code shouldn't normally use this method, because it's unpredictable and any garbage collection can result in it returning null.

        Parameters:
        file - the file for which the document is requested.
        Returns:
        the document, or null if the specified virtual file hasn't been loaded into memory.

      • getFile

        public abstract VirtualFile getFile(Document document)
        Returns the virtual file corresponding to the specified document.
        Parameters:
        document - the document for which the virtual file is requested.
        Returns:
        the file, or null if the document wasn't created from a virtual file.

      • saveAllDocuments

        public abstract void saveAllDocuments()
        Saves all unsaved documents to disk. This operation can modify documents that will be saved (due to 'Strip trailing spaces on Save' functionality). When saving, \n line separators are converted into the ones used normally on the system, or the ones explicitly specified by the user. Encoding settings are honored.

        Should be invoked on the event dispatch thread.

      • saveDocument

        public abstract void saveDocument(Document document)
        Saves the specified document to disk. This operation can modify the document (due to 'Strip trailing spaces on Save' functionality). When saving, \n line separators are converted into the ones used normally on the system, or the ones explicitly specified by the user. Encoding settings are honored.

        Should be invoked on the event dispatch thread.

        Parameters:
        document - the document to save.

      • saveDocumentAsIs

        public abstract void saveDocumentAsIs(Document document)
        Saves the document without stripping the trailing spaces or adding a blank line in the end of the file.

        Should be invoked on the event dispatch thread.

        Parameters:
        document - the document to save.

      • getUnsavedDocuments

        public abstract Document [] getUnsavedDocuments()
        Returns all documents that have unsaved changes.
        Returns:
        the documents that have unsaved changes.

      • isDocumentUnsaved

        public abstract boolean isDocumentUnsaved(Document document)
        Checks if the document has unsaved changes.
        Parameters:
        document - the document to check.
        Returns:
        true if the document has unsaved changes, false otherwise.

      • isFileModified

        public abstract boolean isFileModified(VirtualFile file)
        Checks if the document corresponding to the specified file has unsaved changes.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to check.
        Returns:
        true if the file has unsaved changes, false otherwise.

        Returns:
